description: Freddie Falcon, the Atlanta Falcons mascot, will rally fans at Super Bowl 2017. The Atlanta Falcons mascot costume has changed over the years.
title: Photos: Atlanta Falcons mascot Freddie Falcon
title_page: Photos: Atlanta Falcons mascot Freddie Falcon
text:
1 / 10
The Atlanta Journal-Constitution Freddie Falcon, mascot of the Atlanta Falcons, swarmed by Falcons cheerleaders in the Georgia Dome in Atlanta, Ga. Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.com
2 / 10
ANDY SHARP/AJC Freddie Falcon celebrates Super Bowl fever with fan, Kim Smith, on January 27, 1999 in the Cobb Galleria Specialty Mall. At the time, the Falcons were preparing to take on the Denver Broncos in the team's first-ever Super Bowl. PHOTO BY ANDY SHARP/STAFF
3 / 10
PHIL SKINNER/AJC Freddie the Falcon at an event in Buckhead, Ga in 1998. The Atlanta Falcons mascot costume has changed through the years. (PHIL SKINNER /AJC staff).
4 / 10
Curtis Compton/AJC Freddy the Falcon looks like he can't bear to watch the end of the game as he hides under part of the field decoration in the 4th quarter of the Falcons 38-28 loss in the Falcons vs. Cowboys game at the Georgia Dome December 16, 2006. (Curtis Compton / AJC Staff)
5 / 10
Brant Sanderlin Freddie the Falcon jokes around with a student at M. Agnes Jones Elementary in Atlanta, Georgia on October 20, 2015. BRANT SANDERLIN/BSANDERLIN@AJC.COM
6 / 10
Jason Getz/jgetz@ajc.com Atlanta Falcons mascot Freddie Falcon jumps into a group of students at Morris Brandon Elementary in Atlanta, Ga., October 18, 2011. Jason Getz jgetz@ajc.com
7 / 10
Curtis Compton Atlanta Falcons mascot, Freddie Falcon, during a team event in Dec. 17, 2013, in Lawrenceville, Ga. CURTIS COMPTON / CCOMPTON@AJC.COM
8 / 10
Falcons cornerback Phillip Adams faces off with mascot Freddie Falcon as he takes the field for team practice during mini-camp on Wednesday, June 17, 2015, in Flowery Branch. Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.com
9 / 10
Sean Ryan Atlanta Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan high-fives with the Falcons mascot. Samantha Thompson /NFL
10 / 10
